channel.title: Current design template
channel.description:
http://itendsnow.co.uk/itendsnow/
Working round this as a design at the moment to take over the website at the root of the domain at the moment.
I plan on it being a social website/design website. Place to show off websites, using the new web 2.0 ajax crap people are going on about alot :P Makes the site seem nicer though. Check clicking the image and pressing login. Nothing works as yet, ill post updates as more is added but just ideas regarding the design atm.

item.title: Current design template
item.dc:creator: @itendsnow itendsnow
item.description:
@itendsnow wrote:

The colour scheme will be optional, adding scheme swapper later on, default theme will be a light blue however on launch. Thanks for the replies all =)

item.title: Current design template
item.dc:creator: @itendsnow itendsnow
item.description:
@itendsnow wrote:

haha yeah, alot of people go " I tend snow? " So I try to seperate the words with colouring now heh, will be good for a design during winter though

No blogging (if there will be blogging it will be about website development heh) Hopefully going to get it running as a place for people to show off recent website designs/themes. With a profile page for each user.

Read full topic

item.title: Current design template
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Cool. At first I thought your website was... I Tend Snow lol. But then I realized it ws it ends now.

Nice design, looks king of like a blog typish site. But PLEASE DONT make a blog site.
If these words were people, I would embrace their genocide - by Maddox.

Read full topic
